findings.title: Motherboard: use of safeApprove() in _convertMintInputAssetToVaultToken()
findings.description: The finding highlights the use of safeApprove() in the _convertMintInputAssetToVaultToken() function, which is a best practice issue.

findings.title: Motherboard: flaws in _getAssetAmountMint()
findings.description: Flaws in the _getAssetAmountMint() function of Motherboard contract.

findings.title: RootSafetyCheck: flaws in checkAndPersistMint()
findings.description: Flaws in the checkAndPersistMint function of RootSafetyCheck contract.

findings.title: Motherboard: unchecked result of the safety check
findings.description: The finding indicates a bug where the result of the safety check is not checked in Motherboard.

findings.title: VaultRegistry: deregisterVault() not recycle vault metadata
findings.description: The deregisterVault() function in VaultRegistry does not recycle vault metadata.

findings.title: LPTokenExchangerRegistry: sanity checks for register and deregister
findings.description: Sanity checks are missing for register and deregister functions in LPTokenExchangerRegistry.

findings.title: Motherboard: double-spending exploits for redeem()
findings.description: Double-spending exploits exist in the redeem function of Motherboard contract.

findings.title: Precision Issue in depositFor()
findings.description: Precision issue in depositFor() function of BaseVault contract.

findings.title: BaseVault: handling exceptional cases in exchangeRate()
findings.description: The finding highlights a security issue related to handling exceptional cases in the exchangeRate() function of BaseVault contract.

findings.title: VaultSafetyMode: assertion never violated in checkAndPersistMint()
findings.description: The assertion in the checkAndPersistMint() function of VaultSafetyMode is never violated.

findings.title: _onSwapGivenIn() calls GyroCEMMMath.calcInGivenOut()
findings.description: The function _onSwapGivenIn() makes a call to GyroCEMMMath.calcInGivenOut(), which may lead to precision loss or other issues.

findings.title: SignedFixedPoint rounding
findings.description: Precision loss due to incorrect rounding direction

findings.title: Non-optimal precision of mulA()
findings.description: Precision loss issue due to non-optimal precision of mulA() function.

findings.title: Non-optimal precision of mulAinv()
findings.description: The function mulAinv() has a non-optimal precision which may cause numerical errors.

findings.title: Non-optimal precision of virtualOffsets()
findings.description: Precision loss issue in virtualOffsets() function due to non-optimal precision.

findings.title: Non-optimal precision of maxBalances()
findings.description: Precision loss issue in maxBalances() function due to non-optimal precision.

findings.title: Precision Loss in calcYGivenX() and calcXGivenY() Functions
findings.description: Non-optimal precision of calcYGivenX() and calcXGivenY() functions can cause precision loss.

findings.title: Unnecessary precision loss in fee addition
findings.description: Precision loss occurs during fee addition, potentially leading to inaccurate results.

findings.title: Unnecessary constant factors in solving quadratic equations
findings.description: Unnecessary precision loss due to constant factors in solving quadratic equations.
